channel.title: Nows on A Bear With A Bike And A Baby

item.title: Now
item.description:
Now

WORK

  • I'm currently taking some time off work due to 'Voluntary Redundancy' and am using the time to 'reboot' myself. I'm now looking for a role that is more people oriented.
  • Applied to work in a local prison as a 'Contractor Escort' - helping contractors to move around the prision, ensuring they're following Health and Safety, using correct equiment etc. It's a foot in the door as a more interesting roll would be 'Operational Support Grade' which is basically the date-to-day running of the prison (non-inmate facing).

READING

  • Mistborn Trillogy - Book 3: The Hero of Ages

LISTENING

DOING

  • Working on resurrecting this blog with a new focus - it's possible that I have Autism / ADHD (AuDHD) and so I'll like to chronicle my experience with that here and hopefully help anyone else going through it. You'll see blog posts about it tagged with AuDHD.
